name: Qst Godot 2D Test
description:
Arrows to move.
Press Up to Jump, Down to duck.
F5 or Escape to restart.

Took a good part of the day to familiarize myself with Godot.

Starting earlier today with my 3D Test and now this 2D Test.

I followed the HeartBeast Tutorials for Godot 3.

If anyone has advice, tips or anything for learning and putting Godot to work let me know! ❤

Awesome public domain assets from Open Pixel Project,
So you could say I'm down with OPP.
